subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Despite his 45-foot birdie putt that gave the U.S. its last Ryder Cup victory in 1999, Justin Leonard is an unlikely first-day hero at the 2008 matches.
snippet: Despite his 45-foot birdie putt that gave the U.S. its last Ryder Cup victory in 1999, Justin Leonard is an unlikely first-day hero at the 2008 matches.
